website_summaries.verdict: Get creative with your core workouts using these adaptable sliders.
pros: Great for those who can't or don't want to be at the gym each day, but want a stimulating workout
We love that these sliders work on all types of surfaces, creating engaging core workouts wherever you go
cons: While it comes with free exercise tips, reviews suggest to seek advice elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for getting out of exercise rut
customer_reviews.text: I am not a hard core fitness person. I am a middle-aged woman who was looking to amp up her work out, and not have to constantly move between my carpeted and bare floored rooms to change up my workout. I found the disks provided stable and effective movement. I have been very pleased trying the new exercises in the e-book, even an old girl like me. The core exercises are changing up my routine and I have seen a difference. What I would really like is the option for a larger disk since I use it frequently with a flat foot for skating movements, and a slightly larger disk would be more comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: MEO

customer_reviews.title: Great discs! I've tried a bunch of exercises from ...
customer_reviews.text: Great discs! I've tried a bunch of exercises from the free guide that comes with the package and they definitely give your muscles a run for the money! I have a lot of Cathe Friedrich's DVDS and although I haven't attempted one with the discs they don't harm my hardwood floors, which was my main concern. I've compared this product to others based on reviews and don't disagree with everyone's assessment. They will be a great compliment to my exercise routine!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine A. Draper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for lunges.
customer_reviews.text: I love these little sliders! I was using frisbees, but the little ridge on the frisbee was super annoying. These work best on short carpet or a rug. I don't know if they would be good on hard floors. These help me have perfect form in my lunges, recruit more muscle, and give more challenge to my legs. Combine regular lunges with curtsey lunges and your booty will be on fire the next day! You don't even need to add weight (though you could). Since buying these I've used them about every other day. I also like them for mountain climbers, pike planks, and glute bridges.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Don't slide on carpet so well.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for s few months now and they are OK but don't slide on the carpet so well. I'm a bit surprised as my carpet is really low pile. I think if I was to get a second pair, I'd try another brand. The soft side for hard floors does slide nicely though. The free e-book you receive has some basic exercises but you could probably find that information elsewhere fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Exercise Sliders
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how it looks online. The top is a foam type material and the bottom is a hard plastic. It slides very easy on carpet. To me I feel it would be better for carpet than hardwood because of the plastic on the bottom. You can also slide barefooted with the occasional foot slip. It comes with a guide on different exercises you can do with the sliders. Perfect for when you are doing a quick an session or home workout.
customer_reviews.author: Della M. Major

customer_reviews.title: Building my Core
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for core work and to do Beachbody’s 80 Day Obsession. I have used on my tile floor and carpet. Works well for the most part but my foot slips off sometimes during use. I wish they had a lip to keep my foot on the glider but maybe it’s user error. Maybe once my core strengthens, this will not be an issue. Love the versatility of the two sides. Plastic side for carpet. They glide really well on carpet. The black side for hard floor, like tile.
customer_reviews.author: SClark

customer_reviews.title: They don’t slide!
customer_reviews.text: Sliders that don’t slide! Not only that, but mine came used and scratched up. Probably a return from another reviewer that returned them because they don’t work. Save your money and get sliders intended for furniture. I’ve bought them in the past, they’re strong, durable, and they actually slide.
customer_reviews.author: The Fabulous Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Great sliders!  Use the plastic side for carpets and the other side for hard floors!
customer_reviews.text: I found these sliders work perfectly. I'm amazed at any reviews from people who say they didn't. Most of the bad reviews I saw were from people who didn't use the plastic side for carpet and the other side for hard floors. These are wonderful! Beware of bad reviews. Buy these sliders for great workouts! I've been given some exercises from my personal trainer to do at home and these core sliders were exactly what I needed! The seller is very interested in customer satisfaction and sent me a pdf file with numerous exercises to use these for. Thank you, Iron Core Fitness!
customer_reviews.author: Quahog

customer_reviews.title: Sliders great for hard floor surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The sliders have been working quite well since receiving them. They work best on hard surface floors. The perfect thing I noticed is that they have become quite scratched on the sliding surface and some of the paint from the a sliding surface scratched off and onto the floor. My floor isn’t perfectly smooth so that could be why. Overall a product that words well, but not as expensive as some other brands. If you’re going for function choose these sliders.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workouts on all surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: This seller is terrific. They include a workout card with the sliders, as well as emailing a PDF file of workouts with your order confirmation. I appreciate that their product description was clear that the sliders worked both on hard floors and carpet, and as I mentioned, I really appreciated the workout techniques they sent along with the product. Very pleased with my purchase and the customer service from this vendor. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described and got here very promptly. Seller even sent me a full list of workouts i can do with them, and instructions on how to do them all. Quite satisfied with this company. I think the discs could be slightly bigger, i find my foot comes off sometimes when im doing things on the floor, like mountain climbers. But, overall i really like them and people at the gym have stopped to ask where i got them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Don't neglect your trunk / core!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on carpet or industrial style carpet, indoor. These have become an essential piece of my training arsenal during home-gym training. They come with some exercise instructions if you are looking for a few new ideas as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: They were good in the beginning, but pretty quickly disintegrated. Without that top layer they are not sliding very well anymore... Update 12/18: the top layer of the second Slider has now come off completely too. Working out with these is a Nightmare now.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Weber

customer_reviews.title: Use these often. They do the job, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Use these often. They do the job, but they need to be about an inch bigger. I'm a woman with a small hand so can't imagine a man using these with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky140

customer_reviews.title: They were exactly what I wanted because they were easy to use while creating a challenge
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I have only done one workout with these. I got them to use with Beachbody's PiYo workouts. After doing PiYo for months, I wanted to increase difficulty. I have only used them on carpet floors but they slid perfectly. These absolutely upped the intensity for leg, arm, and ab exercises. They were exactly what I wanted because they were easy to use while creating a challenge. I love that you can increase resistance by pushing down harder on the slides during moves. I also can't complain one bit about the price difference between these and other slides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good budget option!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay these are a great option for the gym. Im not going to sit here and say they slide the easiest are they are scratch resistant, but they do their job. I use them for ab pikes and mountain climbers and they havent failed me yet. I did find some difficulty in sliding them around initially but then I realized I was not centering my weight on the disc properly.
customer_reviews.author: Cake

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried to cheap out - but these didn't really work. Then I got the Beach Body version - and now I can get an amazing workout with my gliders - worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. they are great quality and are so easy to use. They even included a paper showing you the workouts that can be used with this product and explain a little on how to accomplish them. I am always stopped at the gym and asked where I purchased these, everyone wants them too after using them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I was looking for. I've used the sliders on a rubber floor, plastic side down, and on a bamboo floor, soft side down. They slid appropriately on both surfaces. The whole key I have found of sliders is that you keep your weight on the stabilizing body part. I also love the accompanying e-book that shows a variety of exercises that can be done with the sliders. It is one of the most complete tools I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Danner

customer_reviews.title: so I'm glad to finally be on board
customer_reviews.text: I've never had these before, but I've been seeing them everywhere lately, so I'm glad to finally be on board. I bought them for a workout program I'm doing right now. These are usable on both hard floors and carpeted floors, so I appreciate that. They work well for me, and they were a decent price. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: The Iron Core sliders worked well on carpet and tile ...
customer_reviews.text: The Iron Core sliders worked well on carpet and tile. They, however, did not work as well on the rubber gym flooring. I would have typically reflected this in the stars but the seller was extremely responsive and helpful. They stand behind their product 100% and that's the type of seller I want to give my business to.
customer_reviews.author: ADP_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I have bad knees and after sitting, I can’t stand until I extend my leg fully. These allow me at work to easily extend/bend knee on carpet while sitting at my desk at work
customer_reviews.author: Birdlady710

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love these discs. After using similar ones in a fitness class, I wanted to purchase some of my own. These discs are amazing. It's great that you can use them on any type of floor. They make even the most simple plank more difficult. They come with a workout guide, but Pinterest has many other workout ideas. You really can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: c.smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Could be really good and works for me some of the time, but inevitably one of my feet comes off everytime I try to use these. Maybe it's just my lack of coordination but they don't seem to slide as well as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: They do give you a work out
customer_reviews.text: Love these disks!! And am excited that a pamphlet came with them showing different exercises to do with them. Only wish they were a little larger as I have some trouble keeping my entire foot on them. But maybe it’s working in my favor as I have to use more muscles in exercising with these. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: The seller followed up with me to make sure everything was fine. The disks are very nice and work great ...
customer_reviews.text: The whole transaction was flawless. The seller followed up with me to make sure everything was fine. The disks are very nice and work great on both carpet and hardwood floor. Both sides stick (for the lack of a better word) well to the foot and are a very comfortable size (I wear a 9). This is a really wonderful and well priced low impact addition to any home gym, especially if you are a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Surface dependent, but good for workouts
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the hard side on carpet/grass makes for a great workout! However, most of my workouts are done on hardwood and the soft side doesn’t slide very well. It’s doable, but challenging! Depending on your surface these can make a good addition to your workout.
customer_reviews.author: DrBailey

customer_reviews.title: Barley Cam Use Them While Barefoot or Socks.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I bought them because of the price, however, I didn't realize how difficult they would be to use without shoes they keep slipping off. We don't wear shoes in our house so I'm having an issue these things.
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Swing in a miss
customer_reviews.text: I have used all kinds of coarse sliders hoping that this would work on the carpeting at home I do not have shag however this thing must be designed for something is flat it's indoor outdoor carpeting The effort that it takes to keep your feet on these defeats the purpose Leaving you've vulnerable for injuries
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fitness tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my fitness center. The athletes hate them which means they are affective. The amount of exercises with which you can use these is limitless. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working out at home. The plastic side is nice for sliding on any floor surface.
customer_reviews.author: BakerSarah

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy sliders!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them in prime day deal but cheap quality and one of them had scratches. Seems like they were used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun new workout tool!
customer_reviews.text: "These work great. I got them to strengthen my core and I'm so sore, that's how I know they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Mtlmstr

customer_reviews.title: Love! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: 'Super affordable, plus not to mention a great addition to my workout gear/equipment. There are so many variations for upper body, core, and lower body that you can use these sliders with. Also they came with a cool ebook type of thing i(n addition to the paper one) with tons of workouts! Highly recommend! Oh and you can use these on hardwood AND carpet, can't go wrong.'
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I have never even heard of strength sliders before until a friend told me about them. Been using them for a week now and I have never been so sore in my entire life. They are so much fun to use and you get an amazing work out in. Wish I would have purchased them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Annica B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for curtsy lunges with weight. For some reason I can keep my balance way easier with these than if I step back and in to do the lunges. Otherwise I look like an idiot and risk injuring my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given this 5 stars but mine came kinda scratched up. Overall this item is very sturdy. This worked for hardwood floor. A big plus was the website that gave exercise guides. Great for traveling or apartment workouts or people who can’t afford a gym membership.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Just be aware of your floors!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price and I love that it came with easy to follow exercises! I have already added these to my daily workout and love how they easily glide across the carpet! While the product is great, I can only give 3 stars because the discs left horrible scratches on my new laminate flooring! I guess I should have tested them first.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home gym!
customer_reviews.text: "Exactly what I needed for my home gym setup - the plastic side slides very easily on my garage shop mat. Great for mountain climbers and hamstring curls!"
customer_reviews.author: Angie Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Not for every surface
customer_reviews.text: I think these would work great on a perfectly smooth surface but in my garage (even though it seems smooth and I keep it swept) not so much. Gets scratched up immediately and then sticks to the ground. However if I use them on a rug they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: Gliding into Fitness Fun
customer_reviews.text: These discs are a fun and very challenging way to glide into fitness. I only recently started using them (on carpet so far), and they seem to work as advertised. As a beginner user of glider discs, I found patience and foot placement are key to using these disc properly. I'm looking forward to using them as a part of my regular cardio and ab routines.
customer_reviews.author: Veni-Vidi-Veggie

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for supplemental core work
customer_reviews.text: Added this little tool to my morning mobility and core work and it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: giozz21

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have used these in my classes everyday for a year and they have held up, i need more for more students though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Really Good for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: These work great on things like rugs, less so on a plush carpet, but still work great nonetheless! These are a great addition to the home workout arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Kia L.

customer_reviews.title: But once you get comfortable, these are pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These might take a little while to get used to, especially if you have not used anything similar. But once you get comfortable, these are pretty good. I have only tried these on wooden floors and carpet. I don't think these will work well on concrete or all types of rubber flooring. But I have not tried, so I may be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mario N

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I practiced a little when I received them. I do Beachbody programs so they will definitely come in handy tomorrow on core day. I love it and I highly recommend these. The price and quality are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie P

customer_reviews.title: 'I really like the Dual Sided Gliding Discs especially the instruction guide ...
customer_reviews.text: 'I really like the Dual Sided Gliding Discs especially the instruction guide included. It helps me to maximize my workout the correct way. The sliders are true to picture and I have been using them daily. Thanks for the good service and superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Good for standing work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 80 day obsession. They work great for standing work but when it comes to the floor work, they don’t want to move with my foot! I have to push down with all I have onto it and even then, they get left behind half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your workout gear
customer_reviews.text: Work very well on carpet. I tried on the material that gym floors have which is shock absorbable but they don't glide there.You have to get used to the diameter ( standard for these) so that the feet don't get off the sliders. They allow you to put some variety in the leg exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: Kronos1

customer_reviews.title: 'These are great.. I just have to get the hang ...
customer_reviews.text: 'These are great..I just have to get the hang of them". Excellent customer service to follow up on how I like the product and I like the special touch to show me how to use the product!!! I will be using them next week. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Uniquelyme

customer_reviews.title: Won’t slide on floor at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed when I tried them out as I had been very excited to use them. They don’t work on any floor as stated and I was unable to use them at the gym which is where I have to use them. They would stick to the floor and wouldn’t not slide at all. I would not recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Buyer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product definitely feel the difference in my workouts with this new addition. Happy I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jones

customer_reviews.title: No Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any issues with this product. They slide great on all surfaces, easy to carry in a gym bag and it comes with a hand out of exercises explained!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Slides on carpet as well as hardwood floors! Love this set!
customer_reviews.author: ChristiTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for core variations
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for my core variation workouts. I can even utilize them with my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Governor

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This does it work. Tried several surfaces no consistent traction. I even had some one else try it just to make sure it wasn’t just me. Same result. Cheaply made $$$ wasted
customer_reviews.author: trinibaby1978

customer_reviews.title: Easy Real Workout
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how much of a work out I would get from these but they're great. I used them for only about 15 minutes the first time and the next day my abs were sore! Definitely a good work out and I can take them and use them anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Not army green.
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to use it but the green is definitely not army green...more bright green. Not a huge deal but I really wanted all my items to match. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for arms and legs.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and maneuver. I use these with arms and legs. Not for the uncoordinated person lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya H.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like these but I don't love them; they don't slide very well on carpet or on tile floor. I barely use them
customer_reviews.author: TeresaD.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great I’m a small package
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on carpet and tile. No issues at all. Very durable and it also came with a pamphlet for exercise ideas
customer_reviews.author: Sherrell M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product! They do exactly what they are intended
customer_reviews.text: Good product! They do exactly what they are intended. I can definitely use them at home on the carpet or wood floor but I cannot use them in my apartment gym because of the rubber like floor. No biggie though. I prefer to use them bear feet, I can control them better this way.
customer_reviews.author: Katya911

customer_reviews.title: Looooove these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for new exercises and help with reverse lunges and side lunges. I love using them with my clients. You can do so many things, and having two sides helps a ton. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Kati-Lyn Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a low price
customer_reviews.text: Only used them once so far, but they work great! Slides easily on carpet and comes with a little booklet of exercises. Have not tried it on hard surfaces yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: These sliders are very smooth...slide easily. Loved the exercise guide booklet that was sent via email with my order....this is my 3rd time ordering sliders (the first 2 companies did not include an exercise guide). Thank you for that!'
customer_reviews.author: KU

customer_reviews.title: Good product for at home work outs.
customer_reviews.text: Received the sliders a bit roughed up from bottom but other than that issue they work fine. Comes with small instruction pamphlet.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Good not great does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it is pretty sturdy it works well on the carpet but the portion for the hardwood floor doesn't slide as much as you would want
customer_reviews.author: LaRon J Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love these sliders!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sliders to use in the Beachbody workout 80 Day Obsession. They work great on hard floor and on carpet!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works as expected on tile, hard wood and carpet! Perfect for traveling or at home workouts! I appreciate the workout guide that came with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Top Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had no issue keeping a foot on. It slides on both wood and carpet flooring. I appreciate the glossy foldout that includes some additional exercises one can use for the slides.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Batten

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using them and they would slip off my feet but after the 3rd use they don’t do any longer. Kind of fun to have my kids do it. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Love my sliders
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a pair of sliders and so happy I got these. No regrets here
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: My Iron Core Fitness sliders arrived on time and came ...
customer_reviews.text: My Iron Core Fitness sliders arrived on time and came just as pictured on the website. They seem very well made and heavy duty. They even sent me a small booklet of exercise ideas to go along with the sliders.
customer_reviews.author: khunter00

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: core work just got more challenging on my laminate floors. Moving plank variations are so much easier with sliders. These are large enough for my hand or foot to not slip off.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: I found getting the black side wet gave my feet a good grip on them
customer_reviews.text: Using on carpets, it ended up not being very smooth toward the end of my workout program. I found getting the black side wet gave my feet a good grip on them.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal H Winn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have such a flat tummy now, googled a bunch of exercises to do with these guys (along with more fruit and veggie in my diet). works on carpet, flip sides for tiles.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: These work great! I have a workout puzzle floor and these ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I have a workout puzzle floor and these work great on it! I was skeptical, but they work great with the red side down. I also tried them on my carpet and wood floors and they work great on them both, too!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about incorporating these into my workout just because I've always been a dumbbell-kinda girl when it comes to the gym (old school). Not skeptical anymore! I love these babies. They stay in the gym bag and get used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is Great for price. Works beautifully on my carpet and gym floors. They even sent a workout brochure showing many different uses you can do...AWESOME !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome workout with the sliders. My husband uses them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Socks slip easily! These are perfect for the price and I ...
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I wanted. I have carpet and these slide really well on carpet. I do have to either have shoes or bare feet when I use them. Socks slip easily! These are perfect for the price and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: The gilding discs are an effective and inexpensive addition to my home workouts!! They're great for core work and also low impact which is great for my knees. The discs arrived earlier than originally scheduled and work really well on my carpeted floor. I will definitely buy these again and look for other equipment from this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are very sturdy, it's not slippery.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fitness lover and I purchased for the first time any type of gliding disks to change up my workouts, these are very sturdy, it's not slippery, you can do different moves. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Mary

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on concrete floors
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these are great for most people, but they did not work for us on our concrete floors. They didn't slide at all and scratched the new floor paint.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: don't slide as easily as i would like
customer_reviews.text: I have used on carpet and have trouble with them sliding....was not an expensive product but wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these just don’t glide as well as others I’ve previously owned
customer_reviews.author: Solita

customer_reviews.title: do not work!
customer_reviews.text: very cheap hard plastic scratches floor I thought they would be soft and easy to use on any surface like other slides I've used before. they simply don't work
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have wood laminate floors and they don’t slide easily. I trid the cloth side presumably for floors and they didn’t slid easily so i tried the shiny side and they got scratched the first time after use
customer_reviews.author: Da1Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a couple of weeks ago and I love them! They're great quality and work perfectly on the carpet. I like to use them for leg and core workouts to keep my legs lean and they're great for lower ab exercise. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Hanshew

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done The bottom red is plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done The bottom red is plastic. Wish it was similar to cotton to avoid getting your floo scratched. I should’ve investigated
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for any slide exercises. I bought them for 80 Day Obsession and they are working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Flat side works better than soft side.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these, however the black side does not slide very easily. My foot comes off when the slider catches and stops sliding. Plastic side on carpet works better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love them! just what I needed and wanted. Best price out there too
customer_reviews.author: teri b.

customer_reviews.title: It works like it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Moves the way it’s supposed to when training I wear a 7 1/2 shoe my foot fits on the entire disk , could have been a little wider and
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E

customer_reviews.title: Core slider discs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Such an amazing workout. Very pleased with this product. For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Very happy that I purchased them
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very happy that I purchased them. Have been using the smooth surface on a carpet, and have no complaints so far. The company has also been great about contacting me with more information on how to use the discs.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Jade

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great addition to my little HIIT set-up gym
customer_reviews.author: Keith Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use mainly for hamstring curls Was pleasantly surprised with resources for other exercises to do with the sliders They function as expected
customer_reviews.author: Jkjk

customer_reviews.title: workouts are fun
customer_reviews.text: these sliders workout great on the mat I use them on
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Iron Core Gliders
customer_reviews.text: "Iron core gliders are great. So easy to use and they work on all surfaces. You get a complete workout using them and they even help with balance."
customer_reviews.author: Donna Millard

product_meta.title: Iron Core Fitness 2 x Dual Sided Gliding Discs Core Sliders Ultimate Core Ab Fitness Trainer. Gym, Home Abdominal & Total Body Workout Equipment for use on All Surfaces.
feature_bullets: INCREDIBLE CORE TRAINER: Using our core sliders requires constant core stabilisation which delivers an incredible core workout.
TOTAL BODY WORKOUT: Our fitness gliders allow you to perform exercises that target every muscle group, providing great sport and real-world carryover conditioning.
ALL SURFACES: Either at home or at the gym use our core sliders on any surface such as wood, carpet, laminate or tile.
PORTABLE: Our fitness gliders allow you to perform exercises that target every muscle group, Particularly the core.
